item.description:
Enjoy the amazing sounds of The Claflin Hill Symphony Orchestra

Dinner 5:45 pm
Concert: 7:30 pm

Holiday Pops!
A perennial favorite with the New World Chorale, celebrating the season with Tchaikovsky, Handel, John Williams, Mannheim Steamroller and more!!

This is going to be a sell out so RSVP now. Our special price is $25 for this show.

Dinner Details
5:45 pm park at the Town Hall parking lot on the corner of Court and Main Streets then walk over to the Turtle Tavern (affordable pub, located at 72 Main Street). It's just one block up on the same side of the street as the Town Hall where the concert is held.

Skipping Dinner?
Please get your ticket and be in your seat by 7:25 pm. Go to the ticket booth, tell them you are with the Jacki Rose Meetup Group and you will get the $25 rate. They accept credit cards. The seats are assigned, so you will meet the rest of the group there.

If you need to contact me the night of the show, my cell# is 508-381-1529
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in Town Hall parking lot at 5:45 on Court Street.
item.name: Holiday Pops Concert - Claflin Hill Milford
